description: So many devices, so few ports! Connect more HDMI-equipped devices to your display with our Etekcity® 5 port hdmi switcher, and enjoy the convenience of not having to change cables each time you want to use a different device. Works with HD-equipped electronics such as HDTVs, HD-DVDs, Blu-ray players, Xbox 360, PS3 and more. Just use the included remote or the button on the switch box to choose which input you want to use. No need to spend a lot either, as all HDMI switches work on the same technology. Features: Support 12-bit Deep Color, full 1080p; HDMI v1.3 signal in, v1.3 signal out. Multifunctional on switching : intelligent or mechanical Supports HDMI1.3b, HDCP 1.0/1.1; High performance up to 2.5Gbps Supports 25Meters HDMI Cable on both ends of the Switcher Beautiful, sharp HDTV resolutions up to 1080p, 2k, 1440p graphics and computer resolutions up to 1920 x 1200 DOES NOT SUPPORT 2nd GENERATION APPLE TV Package Contents 1 x Etekcity® 5 Port HDMI Switch 1 x Remote 1 x External IR Receiver
title: Etekcity 5x1 Port Switcher Switch with IR Wireless Remote Control
